*** Settings ***
Library    DateTime
Variables  datesandtimes.py

*** Test Cases ***
Valid time
    [Template]  Verification should return true
    1 hours 1 seconds
    1 hour 1 secs 5 millisecs
    1h 1s
    01:01:01.000
    01:01:01
    1:11:11
    ${timedelta(111)}

Invalid time
    [Template]  Verification should return false
    no time here
    1 parsec
    ${datetime.now()}

*** Keywords ***
Verification should return true
    [Arguments]  ${time}
    ${result} =  Should Be Time  ${time}
    Should Be True  ${result}

Verification should return false
    [Arguments]  ${time}
    ${result} =  Should Be Time  ${time}
    Should Not Be True  ${result}
